list_definition.definition: (an outlook on to, or picture of) a scene

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Your house has a fine view of the hills
He painted a view of the harbour.

list_definition.definition: an act of seeing or inspecting

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We were given a private view of the exhibition before it was opened to the public.
She viewed the scene with astonishment.
